body:
Yeah been inactive for a while, seeing most of my old friends leave. I have have read many forum posts saying they were sick of the community, tired of playing Minecraft and not hanging out with their friends IRL. I can understand the last point...but wow I'd never thought they were much of a Minecraft fan. They should come back from time to time I mean they'd probably like to visit us sometime again.

Well yeah that's all I gotta say.
